# Software & Accounts

## Github & Student Developer Pack

Instructions for how to setup your Github account and how to sign-up for the Github [Student Developer Pack](https://education.github.com/pack) will be given in class. Please don't try to activate the Student Developer Pack ahead of class. This is so that it can be configured with the correct procedure.

## CARTO Account

Setup for the CARTO account will be detailed in class after activating the Github Student Developer Pack.

## QGIS

Download and install QGIS form the official [download links](https://qgis.org/en/site/forusers/download.html).

## Anaconda

Download and install Anaconda from the official [download links](https://www.anaconda.com/download/).
